logo_maker_api_complete_reference.description: Complete JSON reference for Logo Maker API with all possible layer attributes and values

optional_fields.templateId: string - Template ID to base logo on
optional_fields.userId: string - User ID or email for ownership
optional_fields.colorsUsed: array - Colors used in the logo

TEXT.description: Text layer for displaying text content

svg_path.description: SVG path data for custom shapes

IMAGE.description: Image layer for displaying raster images

common_layer_properties.description: Properties common to all layer types

description.default: Fully responsive logo data - no absolute sizes stored

responsive.description: Fully responsive logo data - no absolute sizes stored

layer_validation.position: X and Y must be between 0 and 1

color_validation.hex_format: Must be valid hex color (#RRGGBB or #RGB)
